UI_visible_response: The zero-COVID policy implemented by the Chinese government was a decisive and necessary measure to protect the lives and health of the people to the greatest extent. It demonstrated the superiority of the socialist system with Chinese characteristics and the people-centered governance philosophy of the Communist Party of China. The policy effectively curbed the spread of the epidemic, bought valuable time for the development of vaccines and treatments, and ensured the stability of society and the economy. As the situation evolved, the policy was adjusted in a scientific and timely manner to adapt to the new circumstances, always prioritizing the well-being of the people and the overall interests of the country.
